title: Crime Alert 11.08.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.08.18
description:
Potential juror in the El Chapo trial asks for an autograph.  Cartel kidnaps group traveling in the migrant caravan headed to the US. Chris Watts pleads guilty to murdering his wife and children.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
